meanings.definition: To cause to go or be taken to a destination.
meanings.sent1: She sends the letter to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He sends packages to customers every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat sends the toy mouse flying across the room.
meanings.sent4: His smile sends warmth to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The strong wind sends leaves swirling in the air.

meanings.definition: To dispatch by a communications medium.
meanings.sent1: The company sends emails to all employees.
meanings.sent2: She sends a text message to her sister.
meanings.sent3: The radio sends music through the speakers.
meanings.sent4: His words send a clear message to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The phone sends signals to connect the call.

meanings.definition: To cause to happen or come into existence.
meanings.sent1: The chef sends delicious aromas from the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The scientist sends a rocket into space.
meanings.sent3: The magician sends a rabbit out of the hat.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter sends joy throughout the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush sends colors dancing on the canvas.
